channel.title: Kulyn - Back to the past
channel.description:
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/25r0db6.png[/img]
[b]Welcome to Kulyn's Official Development Thread![/b] Our staff is currently creating a Runescape from about... July 2006 Yes, this server will include [b]Hunter[/b], and[b] Construction.[/b] The server's website, however, will not be Runescape's base, our website team will design an appealing website though. We are aiming for the closest thing to Runescape, we hope we will attain the following before the Beta is released to the public to play: all F2p skills (100%) - Player Saving - Banking - Running - Trading (dupe free) - Correct bonus on items, All F2p Quests 100%, Rune platebody dragon slayer needed, and maybe... Tutorial Island. [b]The server is not F2p based, but we will take care of F2p things first and then move on to P2p.[/b]
[b]Current Server Development Updates[/b] [code] June 25, 2011 - (Started) Server Development [/code]
[b]Current Server Features[/b] [code] None Yet... [/code]
[b]Skills Development[/b] Cooking: [b]0%[/b] Woodcutting: [b]0%[/b] Fishing: [b]0%[/b] Runecrafting: [b]0%[/b] Mining: [b]0%[/b] Smithing: [b]0%[/b] Firemaking: [b]0%[/b]
[b]Quest Development[/b] Imp catcher - [b]0%[/b] Rune Mysteries - [b]0%[/b] Sheep Shearer - [b]0%[/b] Vampire Slayer - [b]0%[/b] Doric's Quest - [b]0%[/b] Dragon Slayer - [b]0%[/b] Black Knight's Fortress - [b]0%[/b] Cook's Assistant - [b]0%[/b] Demon Slayer - [b]0%[/b] Ernest the Chicken - [b]0%[/b] Goblin Diplomacy - [b]0%[/b] The Knights Sword - [b]0%[/b] Pirate's Treasure - [b]0%[/b] Prince Ali Rescue - [b]0%[/b] The Restless ghost - [b]0%[/b] Romeo & Juliet - [b]0%[/b] Shield of Arrav - [b]0%[/b] Witch's Potion - [b]0%[/b]
[b]Media[/b] Comming Very Very Soon!

item.title: Kulyn - Back to the past
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“jominite, post:4, topic:400866”]Yes they are everywhere haha, but this is one is gonna be really good.
Gonna have Construction and Hunter cause I have a very experienced team.
And I left because the server wasn’t really going anywhere I didn’t even know what base you were using lol.
PS> Thanks Qoodscape will PM you some updates if the first thread gets too big.[/quote]It was going somewhere… The site was giving me shit uploading it though xD It was at 65% then it went back down to 0… Its fine though cause it looks like your doing a different time then us. GL, still willing to help me out? I’ll give you an exact look alike if ya help me with the forums and account creating, logging in and out

Read full topic

item.title: Kulyn - Back to the past
item.dc:creator: @jominite jominite
item.description:
@jominite wrote:

Welcome to Kulyn’s Official Development Thread!
Our staff is currently creating a Runescape from about… July 2006 Yes, this server will include Hunter, and Construction.
The server’s website, however, will not be Runescape’s base, our website team will design an appealing website though. We are aiming for the closest thing to Runescape, we hope we will attain the following before the Beta is released to the public to play: all F2p skills (100%) - Player Saving - Banking - Running - Trading (dupe free) - Correct bonus on items, All F2p Quests 100%, Rune platebody dragon slayer needed, and maybe… Tutorial Island. The server is not F2p based, but we will take care of F2p things first and then move on to P2p.

Current Server Development Updates

June 25, 2011 - (Started) Server Development
